description: BLANCO America is currently seeking Customer Care Representatives to join our team for the Central and Mountain Time Zones. In this role, you will be responsible for providing a premium service experience for all BLANCO customers throughout the product lifecycle. Your duties will include answering phone calls and emails, resolving customer inquiries and complaints, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
responsibilities:
Provide a premium experience through all customer interactions (emails, phones, social media)
Provide accurate and complete information to the customer to resolve issues in a timely and efficient manner
Provide accurate information about BLANCO products
Become a product expert & function actively as a brand ambassador
Actively participate in creating a customer centric culture to deliver a premium level of service
Collaborate with third party agents, gather customer feedback, and drive continuous improvement within the BLANCO team and within our agencies
Become market & channel champions with a clear focus on account ownership
Develop deep customer relationships to drive brand loyalty
Maintain a professional, friendly manner at all times
Actively participate in the company’s revenue growth by upselling and product consulting

qualifications.required:
High school diploma or equivalent
Must possess a minimum of 3 years of customer service experience
Strong data-entry skills
Proficient computer skills and experience with SAP, customer service software, Microsoft Office Suite, digitalization (Phones, etc.)
Excellent phone etiquette and active listening
Consumer centric mind-set (go above and beyond)
Superior interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills
Ability to adapt/respond to different personalities in a friendly, competent manner
Work with internal departments to meet customer needs, self-driven and team oriented
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
Strong analytical skills and continuous improvement mindset 
Previous experience in CRM implementation an asset

benefits: BLANCO offers a wide range of benefits, designed to help our employees thrive professionally and personally. In addition to highly competitive pay, we offer 401(k) with company match, comprehensive medical, dental and vision benefits, including a robust wellness program; paid time off for vacation, holidays, and sick days; and much more.
